name: Battleloot Adventure
storyline:
Once upon a time, in a faraway land, there was a glamourous kingdom called Kameloot where happiness and prosperity reigned supreme.
Until one day the king decided he wanted more gold and riches for himself, so he levied heavier and heavier taxes.
These austerity measures caused widespread discontent and Kameloot plunged into desperation.
To maintain order, the King established the "Grand Gossip Notoriety Prize".
The winner, that is the most notorious city in Kameloot, won't pay any taxes for one year.
So the four major cities are hiring soldiers of fortune in order to gain prestige and make a good impression on the King.
The stalwart citadel: Home to the Warrior guild, guarded with sentinels over the eastern walls.
The Shady docks: Home to the Roshe guild, they provide a safe port for sailors in Kameloot.
The Magnificent Academy: home to the Sage guild, it also houses a massive library storing decades over decades worth of tomes.
The Sparkling Tower: home to the Mage Guild, it is stuffed with so many magical ingredients it might explode anytime.
Taxes are putting a strain on the citizens of kameloot while the king is rolling in money...
Pick the city you want to side with and earn yourself a living!
summary:
Battleloot Adventure blends comedy and turn-based combat in a role-playing adventure.

Key features include pledging your allegiance to one of four cities: The Stalwart Citadel, The Shady Docks, The Magnificent Academy and The Sparkling Tower.
Recruit an assortment of adventurers, each with their own perks and unique skills.
Carefully choose your 3 ideal adventurers to face each danger ahead.
Upgrade and customize your characters and their abilities.
